# Errors {.unnumbered}

### Github

-   to fix a git push commit holding up
    -   rm .git/index.lock \[in Terminal\]

### Render to PDF if using html widgets
-   if rendering to PDF from HTML widgets (e.g., `leaflet`, `DT`), use the `webshot2` package
    -   install with `install.packages("webshot2")`
    -   ensure that `webshot2::install_phantomjs()` has been run once to install PhantomJS
